cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suisen

sentence.kanji: 今はほとんどのトイレが水洗ですよ。
sentence.romaji: ima ha hotondo no toire ga suisen desu yo
sentence.english: Most toilets nowadays flush.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masaki

sentence.kanji: 合格を真っ先に両親に伝えたの。
sentence.romaji: goukaku wo masaki ni ryoushin ni tsutaeta no
sentence.english: I told my parents first of all that I had passed the exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizenni

sentence.kanji: 硬くならないで、自然に話して下さい。
sentence.romaji: kataku naranai de shizenni hanashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please speak naturally without being formal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagame

sentence.kanji: ここからの眺めは最高です。
sentence.romaji: koko karano nagame ha saikou desu
sentence.english: The view from here is fantastic.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's damaru

sentence.kanji: 彼はいつも黙って仕事をします。
sentence.romaji: kare ha itsumo damate shigoto wo shimasu
sentence.english: He always works in silence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagameru

sentence.kanji: 猫が窓から外を眺めているよ。
sentence.romaji: neko ga mado kara soto wo nagamete iru yo
sentence.english: The cat is at the window staring outside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kane

sentence.kanji: これはかなり金がかかった。
sentence.romaji: kore ha kanari kane ga kakata
sentence.english: This cost quite a bit of money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mataku

sentence.kanji: 私には全く分かりません。
sentence.romaji: watashi ni ha mataku wakarimasen
sentence.english: I don't understand at all.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's cha

sentence.kanji: 私たちは毎日お茶を飲みます。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha mainichi ocha wo nomimasu
sentence.english: We drink tea every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ocha

sentence.kanji: お茶を入れましょうか。
sentence.romaji: ocha wo iremashou ka
sentence.english: Shall I make tea?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chawan

sentence.kanji: 茶わんにご飯をよそいました。
sentence.romaji: chawan ni gohan wo yosoimashita
sentence.english: I put some rice into the rice bowl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenzen

sentence.kanji: この本は全然面白くなかった。
sentence.romaji: kono hon ha zenzen omoshiroku nakata
sentence.english: This book wasn't interesting at all.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sekai

sentence.kanji: 私は世界旅行をしたい。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sekai ryokou wo shitai
sentence.english: I want to travel around the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's anzen

sentence.kanji: 安全が第一です。
sentence.romaji: anzen ga daiichi desu
sentence.english: Safety comes first.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は金のネックレスをしています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kin no nekuresu wo shite imasu
sentence.english: She's wearing a gold necklace.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuumoku

sentence.kanji: 私たちはその会社に注目している。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha sono kaisha ni chuumoku shite iru
sentence.english: We have our eyes on that company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hashira

sentence.kanji: この家の柱は太い。
sentence.romaji: kono ie no hashira ha futoi
sentence.english: The pillars in this house are thick.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chokin

sentence.kanji: 貯金は十分にあります。
sentence.romaji: chokin ha juubun ni arimasu
sentence.english: I have enough savings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuru

sentence.kanji: 昨日大きな魚を釣りました。
sentence.romaji: kinou ooki na sakana wo tsurimashita
sentence.english: I caught a big fish yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otsuri

sentence.kanji: 母はお釣りを確かめた。
sentence.romaji: haha ha otsuri wo tashikameta
sentence.english: My mother checked the change.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's au

sentence.kanji: この靴は私の足に合っている。
sentence.romaji: kono kutsu ha watashi no ashi ni ate iru
sentence.english: These shoes fit me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taikin

sentence.kanji: このかばんには大金が入っています。
sentence.romaji: kono kaban ni ha taikin ga haite imasu
sentence.english: This bag contains a lot of money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's awaseru

sentence.kanji: 日時はご都合に合わせます。
sentence.romaji: nichiji ha gotsugou ni awasemasu
sentence.english: The date can be decided according to your schedule.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's goudou

sentence.kanji: 3社合同で新作の発表会を開きました。
sentence.romaji: sansha goudou de shinsaku no hapyoukai wo hirakimashita
sentence.english: Three companies had a joint presentation for their new products.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinri

sentence.kanji: 彼は人生の真理を求めて旅に出た。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jinsei no shinri wo motomete tabi ni deta
sentence.english: He went on a journey in search of the true meaning of life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's araware

sentence.kanji: それは彼女の期待の現れです。
sentence.romaji: sore ha kanojo no kitai no araware desu
sentence.english: It is a manifestation of her expectations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoni

sentence.kanji: この商品は主に女性に人気がありまして。
sentence.romaji: kono shouhin ha omoni josei ni ninki ga arimashi te
sentence.english: This product is mainly popular among women.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omo

sentence.kanji: 彼女の主な仕事は接客だよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no omo na shigoto ha sekyaku da yo
sentence.english: Her main job is customer service.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishuteki

sentence.kanji: 学生たちは自主的に勉強会を開いたわよ。
sentence.romaji: gakuseitachi ha jishuteki ni benkyoukai wo hiraita wa yo
sentence.english: Students held an independent study meeting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gouriteki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は合理的な考え方をする人です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha gouriteki na kangaekata wo suru hito desu
sentence.english: She is a person who thinks logically.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sosogu

sentence.kanji: みんなのグラスにジュースを注いだよ。
sentence.romaji: minna no gurasu ni ju-su wo sosoida yo
sentence.english: I poured juice into everyone's glass.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's guai

sentence.kanji: 今日は体の具合が悪いです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha karada no guai ga warui desu
sentence.english: I feel unwell today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanzen

sentence.kanji: この古い寺院は今でも完全な形を保っているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kono furui jiin ha ima de mo kanzen na katachi wo tamote iru n da
sentence.english: This old Buddhist temple still maintains its complete form.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genri

sentence.kanji: 見学者に機械の動く原理を説明しました。
sentence.romaji: kengakusha ni kikai no ugoku genri wo setsumei shimashita
sentence.english: I explained the mechanism of the machine to the visitor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genkin

sentence.kanji: 代金は現金でお願いします。
sentence.romaji: daikin ha genkin de onegai shimasu
sentence.english: Please pay the price in cash.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genjou

sentence.kanji: 問題を解決できないのが現状です。
sentence.romaji: mondai wo kaiketsu dekinai no ga genjou desu
sentence.english: The current situation is that we can't solve the problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishu

sentence.kanji: その選手は自主トレーニングを始めたの。
sentence.romaji: sono senshu ha jishutore-ningu wo hajimeta no
sentence.english: Those players started training independently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arawareru

sentence.kanji: 雲の間から太陽が現れました。
sentence.romaji: kumo no aida kara taiyou ga arawaremashita
sentence.english: The sun appeared between the clouds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houseki

sentence.kanji: 私が一番好きな宝石はダイヤモンドなの。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga ichiban suki na houseki ha daiyamondo nano
sentence.english: My favorite jewel is diamonds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's awasu

sentence.kanji: 赤に黄色を合わすと何色になりますか。
sentence.romaji: aka ni kiiro wo awasuto naniiro ni narimasu ka
sentence.english: What color do you get if you add yellow to red?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanemouke

sentence.kanji: 金もうけが彼の趣味だ。
sentence.romaji: kanemouke ga kare no shumi da
sentence.english: Moneymaking is his hobby.

cards.english: meeting with a view to marriage
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miai

sentence.kanji: うちの両親はお見合い結婚でした。
sentence.romaji: uchi no ryoushin ha omiai kekon deshita
sentence.english: My parents had an arranged marriage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuu

sentence.kanji: 詳しくは注を読んでください。
sentence.romaji: kuwashikuha chuu wo yonde kudasai
sentence.english: For details, please read the notes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mechakucha

sentence.kanji: 彼の運転は目茶苦茶です。
sentence.romaji: kare no unten ha mechakucha desu
sentence.english: His driving is awful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenin

sentence.kanji: チーム全員に名札が配られました。
sentence.romaji: chi-mu zenin ni nafuda ga kubararemashita
sentence.english: The name tags were distributed to the whole team.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's subete

sentence.kanji: 彼に全てのことを伝えた。
sentence.romaji: kare ni subete no koto wo tsutaeta
sentence.english: I told him everything.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arawasu

sentence.kanji: 彼はようやく姿を現しましたね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha youyaku sugata wo arawashimashita ne
sentence.english: He finally showed up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hari

sentence.kanji: 母は糸を針に通した。
sentence.romaji: haha ha ito wo hari ni tooshita
sentence.english: My mother threaded the needle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuri

sentence.kanji: 父は釣りが大好きです。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha tsuri ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: My father loves fishing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuriai

sentence.kanji: この紙飛行機は左右の釣り合いがとれていないな。
sentence.romaji: kono kamihikouki ha sayuu no tsuriai ga torete inai na
sentence.english: The right-left balance on this paper airplane isn't right.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuriau

sentence.kanji: 収入と支出が釣り合っていない。
sentence.romaji: shuunyuu to shishutsu ga tsuriate inai
sentence.english: The income and expenses don't balance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ou

sentence.kanji: 王の墓を見学したよ。
sentence.romaji: ou no haka wo kengaku shita yo
sentence.english: I visited the royal grave.
